about_the_game:
Duh! Winning! – Carlos Irwin Estévez

Missions are an all-new card type that give players an alternate win condition. Each player receives three missions at the start of the game, which are hidden from their opponent. When a player fulfills the objective, they reveal the mission and score the reward. A player may only complete a Mission once per turn, but when they score their third and final mission, they win the game!

The Star Realms: United Missions expansion contains 12 unique cards: Ally, Armada, Colonize, Convert, Defend, Diversify, Dominate, Exterminate, Influence, Monopolize, Rule, and Unite.

A player may only complete a Mission once per turn, but when they score their third and final mission, they win the game!

The Star Realms: United Missions expansion contains 12 unique cards: Ally, Armada, Colonize, Convert, Defend, Diversify, Dominate, Exterminate, Influence, Monopolize, Rule, and Unite.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.

name: Star Realms - United: Missions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.

short_description: This expansion contains 12 cards that you can use in online play, versus the AI or a friend, or in the 16th chapter of the campaign.
